source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an interior scenery shot of a dimly lit bedroom at night. The scene reveals a dark-colored trunk with a pink interior, sitting open on the floor next to a white, three-drawer dresser, before a slow pan to the right shows a dark doorway leading into a hallway where a faint, cool light emanates from the distance. There is no main subject, as the focus is on establishing a mysterious and suspenseful atmosphere through the low-key lighting and shadowy environment. The camera's movement across the space serves to build tension by exploring the setting itself rather than focusing on a particular object or character.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.

bad_caption: A young man with short blond hair, wearing a bright blue hoodie and black jeans, sits cross-legged on a large green beanbag in the center of a well-lit living room. To his right, a small brown dog with a white patch on its chest lies curled up on a round, patterned rug. A glass coffee table with a stack of colorful magazines and a red ceramic mug is positioned in front of the man. In the background, a tall bookshelf filled with books and potted plants lines the wall, and a large window lets in sunlight, casting soft shadows across the room. The man appears to be looking at the dog, who is resting quietly, and there are no other people present in the scene.
